1. She Wanted to Save the World From A.I. Then the Killings Started.  The New York Times

item.title: EU sticks with timeline for AI rules - Reuters
item.description:
1. EU sticks with timeline for AI rules  Reuters
  2. European Union Unveils Rules for Powerful A.I. Systems  The New York Times
  3. EU code of practice to help firms comply with AI rules will focus on copyright, safety  Reuters
  4. EU Lays Out AI Code of Practice to Guide Companies on Compliance  WSJ
  5. EU rolls out AI code with broad copyright, transparency rules  The Detroit News
